title: Unexpected Friendship!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>You-san, how do you think I can make this part?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hmm.... This shape will be hard to make with a cloth. If we want to keep the shape like this, then maybe we can use plastic boards....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I see.... It’s hard to make this uniform’s shape in real life, huh. I thought this uniform looked really cool in the anime, so I would like to incorporate some of its elements into my next outfit, but....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I understand how you feel! This uniform looks really good.... I really think so. I also like it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Right!? Waah, it seems like we have the same taste. Then, what do you think about the uniforms in this show? This one is the uniform of the school the main character’s rival goes to....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eeh, I love it! I really like this one too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Really!? I’m so happy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I think I can make this uniform. Look, if we put this area right here.... into the outfit, I think it fits perfectly<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Eh!? You can do it!? T-, then, I’d like to think some more about the design, can we think about it together....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Leave it to me! Let’s make the best outfit!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
